# Overview

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository contains the corpus data and grammaticality judgement results underlying our paper on *ka*- and -*a* passives in Balinese. In addition, it includes R code file documenting steps for our statistical analyses and visualisation output.
